draftError.title: Sorry, something went wrong
draftError.description: There is something wrong with the report draft. We will reload it but your current draft will be overwritten. Otherwise you can do it manually after pressing dismiss.

hasEmptyValueAlert.title: Empty Value Found
hasEmptyValueAlert.description: Some of the SKUs have empty value. Are you sure you want to proceed?

deleteNoteModal.title: Delete Note
deleteNoteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action can't be undone.

deleteMediaModal.title: Delete media attachments
deleteMediaModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete all attachments? This action can't be undone.

applyToAllSkusModal.description: Do you want to apply selection to all SKUs? Stock numbers will be discarded when you unselect these options
